name: interviewtest
description: 1. Go inside the frontend folder and backend folder using command prompt. 2. type npm install 3. type npm start

scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm start --prefix backend
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run cluster --prefix backend
